code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var StatusColor=function StatusColor(_ref){var data=_ref.data;var color="24FF00";if(data.status==="ARRIVED"){color="green";}else if(data.status==="TRANSPORT_ERROR"){color="red";}else if(data.status==="IN_TRANSIT"){color="blue";}else if(data.status==="ROLL_OVER"){color="yellow";}else if(data.status==="CANCELLED"){color="grey";}else if(data.status==="CUSTOMS_HOLD"){color="orange";}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dotSlot",style:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"row",margin:"0 5px 0 10px",padding:"5px",height:"1vh",aspectRatio:"1/1",borderRadius:"360px",backgroundColor:color,opacity:"80%"}})});};export default StatusColor;
